biotools.summary: Lineagespot is a framework written in R, and aims to identify and assign different SARS-CoV-2 lineages based on a single variant file (i.e., variant calling format).

bioschemas.name: lineagespot
bioschemas.summary: Lineagespot is a framework written in R, and aims to identify and assign different SARS-CoV-2 lineages based on a single variant file (i.e., variant calling format).

galaxy.summary: Identification of SARS-CoV-2 related metagenomic mutations based on a single (or a list of) variant(s) file(s)
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Lineagespot is a framework written in R, and aims to identify and assign different SARS-CoV-2 lineages based on a single variant file (i.e., variant calling format).
